abstract.p: New York Civil Liberties Union executive director Norman Siegel lauds Benjamin Weiser's August 6 article on wrongful incarceration of Kerry Sanders (S)

block.p: Weiser's article is investigative journalism at its best. The failure to check fingerprints and photographs and the insensitivity detailed in the article are shocking. New York State should settle the lawsuit with not only a substantial financial payment to Kerry Sanders but also an apology, and the goal of making sure nothing like it ever happens again.
Norman Siegel Executive Director New York Civil Liberties Union New York
